itinerary.mapNote: Chain Ladders ascent from Sentinel. Mont-aux-Sources 3282m. 3200m.
Escarpment traverse south. Ifidi Peak 3225m area. 3100m.
Mnweni Cut-back col. Remote plateau cave camp. 3050m.
Cape Eagle Pass 3250m. Twin-spire cave bivouac. 3200m.
Cleft Peak 3277m area. Southern Royal Natal section. 3150m.
Champagne Castle 3377m. Highest section of traverse. 3300m.
Below Mafadi 3451m — highest point in South Africa. 3050m.
Thaba Kotu 3240m. Flat escarpment plateau day. 3000m.
Thabana Ntlenyana 3482m — highest in southern Africa. Sani Pass. 3400m.
Black Mountain 3300m. Last high escarpment cave. 3200m.
Descent off escarpment. SA/Lesotho border. Trail end. 1700m.

waypoints.name: Chain Ladders
waypoints.note: Fixed steel ladders up vertical basalt cliff. Trek entry to escarpment.

waypoints.name: Mont-aux-Sources
waypoints.note: Trek start area high point. Amphitheatre and Tugela Falls source.

waypoints.name: Tugela Falls
waypoints.note: World's second tallest waterfall. 948m. Plunges off Amphitheatre.

waypoints.name: Mafadi
waypoints.note: Highest point in South Africa. Day 7 area.

waypoints.name: Thabana Ntlenyana
waypoints.note: Highest peak in southern Africa (Lesotho side). Sani Pass area.

waypoints.name: Sani Pass
waypoints.note: Famous 4x4 road between SA and Lesotho. World's highest pub at top.

waypoints.name: Champagne Castle
waypoints.note: Day 6 high point. Second highest peak in SA. Cathedral Peak group.
